text: is a song by Japanese singer-songwriter Mai Kuraki. The song was released as second single from her tenth studio album Over the Rainbow on May 25, 2011. == In popular culture == "Mō Ichido" served as the theme song to the television series Kiri ni Sumu Akuma. == Track listing == == Release history == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Version ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- ! rowspan="4"|Various | rowspan="4"|May 25, 2011 | rowspan="2"|Standard edition | Digital download | rowspan="4"| Northern Music |- | CD |- | Limited edition | CD+Merchandise |- | Musing & FC edition | CD |- |} Category:2011 singles Category:Mai Kuraki songs
title: Mō Ichido
